settings.text: Update: Thanks to the amazing response to their initiative - and a reduction in demand for meals - Meals for the NHS delivered their last meals on 30th June 2020. Therefore, we are no longer donating to this cause. Thank you again to everyone who purchased the sweaters and T-shirts!

Last month, we launched our Hearts for our NHS campaign with the hope of being able to support Meals for the NHS – a not for profit initiative which teams up with local restaurants to provide much-needed nutritious meals to our frontline heroes. We have been absolutely blown away by the response to this campaign and are delighted to announce that, with your help, we have donated

£11,500

to this cause so far – that’s the equivalent of 2,300 delicious meals.

settings.grid-content: As a British brand, we are incredibly proud of our NHS and, amidst the chaos of Covid-19, were keen to find a way to show our gratitude to those working tirelessly to save lives. It just so happened that we already had the Anni Hearts sweaters and T-shirts, in NHS blue, emblazoned with beautiful big hearts on the front – it was meant to be! With a promise of donating 100% of profits from these styles to the initiative, we quickly sold out of the blue colourway and so introduced the berry styles in order to continue to raise more funds. There are still limited quantities of these left.

settings.title: A Show of Support
settings.text: When we told friends of the brand what we were up to, they were delighted to get behind this important cause. Thank you to everyone who helped to spread the word and, most importantly, thank you to everyone who purchased – we hope you love wearing your sweater or T-shirt with pride.
